name: Web Automation Agent
description: This agent provides capabilities for web automation using Selenium and web browsing actions.

skills.name: Selenium Actions
skills.description: Perform various actions using Selenium for web automation.
examples: Open a browser and navigate to a URL
Click on a button on the webpage

skills.name: Web Browsing
skills.description: Perform web browsing actions, including searching and validating web pages.
examples: Search for a term and retrieve text
Validate a webpage by checking its elements
